name: Decarbonization Technologies, Inc.
description: Decarbonization Technologies, Inc. is at the forefront of the global effort to combat climate change through innovative solutions aimed at reducing carbon emissions. Founded in 2015, the company focuses on developing advanced technologies that facilitate carbon capture, utilization, and storage (CCUS) in various industrial processes. With a mission to deliver sustainable and scalable solutions, DECZ aims to transform energy-intensive industries such as cement, steel, and chemical production, significantly lowering their carbon footprints. By integrating cutting-edge research with practical applications, Decarbonization Technologies helps companies transition towards a greener future. The company’s flagship product, the Carbon Clean System, utilizes proprietary technology to efficiently capture CO2 emissions and convert them into valuable products, thus creating a circular carbon economy. Additionally, DECZ is actively involved in partnerships with governments and organizations worldwide to promote policies that support decarbonization initiatives. The company is committed to transparency and sustainability, ensuring that its operations not only meet regulatory requirements but also contribute positively to the environment and society.
